name: Missão Inglória
description:
A Inglorious Bastard Inspired Game!

Enter a Nazi palace to eliminate evidence and witnesses that could compromise your and your squad's identity. Be careful not to be identified.

Fennec Dreams Team

Artist: Daniel Tibana

Artist: Dara Gushiken

Artist: Filipi Gushiken

Artist: Isabella Pereira

Artist: Lucca Menegon

Developer: Fabio Yoshikawa

Developer: Felipe Vicente

Sound Designer: Gustavo Vianna

Game Designer: Victor Valdo
